Dockerizing Com S 363

Project maintained by cyber-atlas Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by mattgraham

What We Have Here

This is an effort to help others who had technological issues in Com S 363 at Iowa State This is my attempt to do so through the use of Docker. A lot of the information contained in this guide is not my own. I used many resources to help create this.

Prerequisites

An installation of Docker. This can be done in multiple ways.
